content: From here you’ll want to stay along the paths to the left to head up and then over to an area with a large waterfall and four statues. With the Loong Scales, you’ll hear a voice speak to you, which means you’re in the right spot.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Red_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Red Loong', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Red Loong'.
The content is as follows:
From here you’ll want to stay along the paths to the left to head up and then over to an area with a large waterfall and four statues. With the Loong Scales, you’ll hear a voice speak to you, which means you’re in the right spot.
